INSERT INTO board_free( board_title, board_content, board_writer, board_no )
VALUES (#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardNo}) ;
mapper.select:
SELECT bf.board_no, bf.board_title, bf.board_writer, bb.board_reg_date, bb.board_mod_date, bb.board_view, bb.category_board
FROM board_free bf LEFT JOIN base_board bb ON bf.board_no = bb.board_no
ORDER BY bf.board_no DESC
LIMIT 0, 10 ;
